work.name: Free2Move Deutschland GmbH
work.summary:
Led development efforts across multiple projects while other engineers. Spearheaded process improvements and established engineering standards as well as providing technical guidance to stakeholders.

 Tech Stack: Nuxt3/Vue3, Tailwind, GraphQL, TypeScript, Node, Go, AWS Stack (SNS, SQS, etc.), Docker + K8s, RabbitMQ
highlights: Leading development efforts across multiple projects and provide mentoring to other engineers
Acting as the lead developer for a company-wide component library
Established processes to improve knowledge distribution across team members and preparatory plan to introduce other developers into the team oncall plan
Led an effort to standardize deployments and infrastructure provisioning for existing services
Led efforts to establish conventions and best practices within the team
Tech Stack: Nuxt3/Vue3, Tailwind, GraphQL, TypeScript, Node, Go, AWS Stack (SNS, SQS, etc.), Docker + K8s, RabbitMQ

work.name: Share NOW GmbH / Free2Move
work.summary:
Acting as the lead frontend engineer in the team alongside being a mentor to other engineers. Also, dove deep into asynchronous messaging by building a system that processes live rental data.

 Stack: Nuxt3/Vue3, Tailwind, GraphQL/Apollo, TypeScript, Node/Express
highlights: Core team member of company-wide component library and design system. Responsible in its API design and feature developments
Worked with WebViews and Micro-Frontend architecture
Designed and implemented asynchronous system with message queues that processes live rental data
Tech Stack: Nuxt3/Vue3, Tailwind, GraphQL, TypeScript, Node, Docker + K8s, RabbitMQ

work.name: Share NOW GmbH
work.summary:
Continuing my work in Share NOW right after graduating from my studies. Created and succesfully executed a migration plan to migrate the company backoffice application (Vue 2) into a Nuxt3 (Vue3) project, thus increasing its performance (LCP, 75th percentile) from 4.2s to 2s.

Stack: Vue2 + Nuxt3/Vue3, Tailwind, GraphQL/Apollo, TypeScript, Node/Express
highlights: Core team member of company-wide component library and design system. Migrated the company-wide component library from Vue2 to Vue3
Worked with multiple teams to help them during the migration process of their micro-frontends (Vue2 to Vue3). Communicating migration plans and deadlines
Increased web performance of the app (Largest Contentful Paint / LCP) from 4.2s to 2.6s
Tech Stack: Vue2, Nuxt3/Vue3, Tailwind, GraphQL, TypeScript, Node,  Docker + K8s, Terraform

work.name: Share NOW GmbH

work.name: Etheral
work.summary:
Etheral is a local business in Indonesia that sells handmade jewelries. I worked with them to build their e-commerce website https://etheralmade.com. Unfortunately the original domain is no longer available, the site is still accessible at https://fervent-minsky-bc0840.netlify.app/.

Feature for the site includes: payment integration, mailing list subscription, multi-user admin dashboard, on-demand shipping cost calculation, and order confirmation email.

Stack: React/Gatsby, Styled Components, Firestore, Netlify Lambda, TypeScript
highlights: Built the e-commerce website from scratch. Worked closely with the client to design the website and its features
Implemented auth system with firebase auth, payment integration as well as mailing list subscription system
Implemented multi-user admin dashboard to manage orders and products
Tech Stack: React/Gatsby, Styled Components, Firestore, Netlify Lambda, TypeScript
